webpack/lib/util/registerExternalSerializerwebpack-sources/ReplaceSourcewebpack/lib/util/registerExternalSerializerwebpack-sources/SourceMapSource␀␀import { jsxDEV as _jsxDEV } from "react/jsx-dev-runtime";
import { getDataFromIndexDB, setDataToIndexdDB, setGitDataToIndexdDB, setSanskritamWorldDataToIndexdDB } from "@/pages/api/api";
import axios from "axios";
import { createContext, useEffect, useState } from "react";
import Sanscript from "sanscript";
export const MahabhashayakatanayayContext = /*#__PURE__*/ createContext();
export const MahabhashayakatanayayContextProvider = ({ children  })=>{
    const [call, setCall] = useState();
    // ================  mahabhashayakatanayay STATE  ================ //
    const [filterMahabhashayakatanayay, setFilterMahabhashayakatanayay] = useState();
    const [mahabhashayakatanayay, setMahabhashayakatanayay] = useState();
    // useEffect(() => {
    //   setGitDataToIndexdDB("mahabhashayakatanayay").then(() => {
    //     setCall("mahabhashayakatanayay");
    //   });
    // }, []);
    // useEffect(() => {
    //   // ================  mahabhashayakatanayay DATA GET  ================ //
    //   getDataFromIndexDB("mahabhashayakatanayay").then((data) => {
    //     setMahabhashayakatanayay(data?.data);
    //   });
    // }, [call]);
    const diacriticsMap = {
        ā: "aa",
        ī: "ee",
        ū: "oo",
        ṛ: "ru",
        l̥: "lu",
        ṅ: "n",
        ñ: "n",
        ṭ: "t",
        ṭh: "th",
        ḍ: "d",
        ḍh: "dh",
        ṇ: "n",
        ś: "sh",
        ṣ: "sh",
        ḥ: "h",
        kṣ: "ksh",
        jñ: "dnya",
        ṁ: "m",
        "j~j": "dnya",
        "~j": "n",
        "~g": "n",
        "~lu": "lu",
        uu: "oo",
        ii: "ee"
    };
    const devanagariCache = new Map();
    const getDevanagariSearchStrings = (t)=>{
        if (!t || !t.trim()) {
            return [];
        }
        if (devanagariCache.has(t)) {
            return devanagariCache.get(t);
        }
        const schemes = [
            "itrans",
            "slp1",
            "hk",
            "iast"
        ];
        const uniqueInputs = new Set([
            t,
            t.toLowerCase()
        ]);
        const devanagariStrings = [];
        for (const scheme of schemes){
            for (const input of uniqueInputs){
                if (input) {
                    devanagariStrings.push(Sanscript.t(input, scheme, "devanagari"));
                    if (![
                        "a",
                        "e",
                        "i",
                        "o",
                        "u"
                    ].includes(input.slice(-1))) {
                        devanagariStrings.push(Sanscript.t(input + "a", scheme, "devanagari"));
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        const result = [
            ...new Set(devanagariStrings)
        ].filter((string)=>string.split("").every((char)=>![
                    "a".charCodeAt(),
                    "z".charCodeAt()
                ].between(char.charCodeAt()) && !Object.keys(diacriticsMap).includes(char) && ![
                    "A".charCodeAt(),
                    "Z".charCodeAt()
                ].between(char.charCodeAt())));
        devanagariCache.set(t, result);
        return result;
    };
    function checkWordsInString(mainString, wordArray) {
        for (let word of wordArray){
            if (mainString?.includes(word)) {
                return true;
            }
        }
        return false;
    }
    const getData = async ()=>{
        try {
            const response = await axios.get("/api/mahabhashayakatanayay");
            setMahabhashayakatanayay(response.data);
            setFilterMahabhashayakatanayay(response.data);
            return;
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("Error geting data:", error);
        }
    };
    useEffect(()=>{
        getData();
    }, []);
    const filterData = (val)=>{
        const filteredResults = [];
        if (val) {
            mahabhashayakatanayay && mahabhashayakatanayay.map((item)=>{
                if (checkWordsInString(item.s?.toLowerCase(), getDevanagariSearchStrings(val))) {
                    filteredResults.push(item);
                }
            });
            setFilterMahabhashayakatanayay(filteredResults);
        } else {
            setFilterMahabhashayakatanayay(mahabhashayakatanayay);
        }
    };
    return /*#__PURE__*/ _jsxDEV(MahabhashayakatanayayContext.Provider, {
        value: {
            mahabhashayakatanayay,
            filterMahabhashayakatanayay,
            filterData
        },
        children: children
    }, void 0, false, {
        fileName: "H:\\DHRUVIK\\sardhar-ashtadhyayi\\src\\utils\\ashtadhyayi\\MahabhashayakatanayayContext.js",
        lineNumber: 140,
        columnNumber: 5
    }, this);
};

const MahabhashayakatanayayContext = /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.createContext)();
const MahabhashayakatanayayContextProvider = ({ children  })=>{
    const [call, setCall] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.useState)();
    // ================  mahabhashayakatanayay STATE  ================ //
    const [filterMahabhashayakatanayay, setFilterMahabhashayakatanayay] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.useState)();
    const [mahabhashayakatanayay, setMahabhashayakatanayay] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.useState)();
    // useEffect(() => {
    //   setGitDataToIndexdDB("mahabhashayakatanayay").then(() => {
    //     setCall("mahabhashayakatanayay");
    //   });
    // }, []);
    // useEffect(() => {
    //   // ================  mahabhashayakatanayay DATA GET  ================ //
    //   getDataFromIndexDB("mahabhashayakatanayay").then((data) => {
    //     setMahabhashayakatanayay(data?.data);
    //   });
    // }, [call]);
    const diacriticsMap = {
        ā: "aa",
        ī: "ee",
        ū: "oo",
        ṛ: "ru",
        l̥: "lu",
        ṅ: "n",
        ñ: "n",
        ṭ: "t",
        ṭh: "th",
        ḍ: "d",
        ḍh: "dh",
        ṇ: "n",
        ś: "sh",
        ṣ: "sh",
        ḥ: "h",
        kṣ: "ksh",
        jñ: "dnya",
        ṁ: "m",
        "j~j": "dnya",
        "~j": "n",
        "~g": "n",
        "~lu": "lu",
        uu: "oo",
        ii: "ee"
    };
    const devanagariCache = new Map();
    const getDevanagariSearchStrings = (t)=>{
        if (!t || !t.trim()) {
            return [];
        }
        if (devanagariCache.has(t)) {
            return devanagariCache.get(t);
        }
        const schemes = [
            "itrans",
            "slp1",
            "hk",
            "iast"
        ];
        const uniqueInputs = new Set([
            t,
            t.toLowerCase()
        ]);
        const devanagariStrings = [];
        for (const scheme of schemes){
            for (const input of uniqueInputs){
                if (input) {
                    devanagariStrings.push(sanscript__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_4___default().t(input, scheme, "devanagari"));
                    if (![
                        "a",
                        "e",
                        "i",
                        "o",
                        "u"
                    ].includes(input.slice(-1))) {
                        devanagariStrings.push(sanscript__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_4___default().t(input + "a", scheme, "devanagari"));
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        const result = [
            ...new Set(devanagariStrings)
        ].filter((string)=>string.split("").every((char)=>![
                    "a".charCodeAt(),
                    "z".charCodeAt()
                ].between(char.charCodeAt()) && !Object.keys(diacriticsMap).includes(char) && ![
                    "A".charCodeAt(),
                    "Z".charCodeAt()
                ].between(char.charCodeAt())));
        devanagariCache.set(t, result);
        return result;
    };
    function checkWordsInString(mainString, wordArray) {
        for (let word of wordArray){
            if (mainString?.includes(word)) {
                return true;
            }
        }
        return false;
    }
    const getData = async ()=>{
        try {
            const response = await axios__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__["default"].get("/api/mahabhashayakatanayay");
            setMahabhashayakatanayay(response.data);
            setFilterMahabhashayakatanayay(response.data);
            return;
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("Error geting data:", error);
        }
    };
    (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.useEffect)(()=>{
        getData();
    }, []);
    const filterData = (val)=>{
        const filteredResults = [];
        if (val) {
            mahabhashayakatanayay && mahabhashayakatanayay.map((item)=>{
                if (checkWordsInString(item.s?.toLowerCase(), getDevanagariSearchStrings(val))) {
                    filteredResults.push(item);
                }
            });
            setFilterMahabhashayakatanayay(filteredResults);
        } else {
            setFilterMahabhashayakatanayay(mahabhashayakatanayay);
        }
    };
    return /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(MahabhashayakatanayayContext.Provider, {
        value: {
            mahabhashayakatanayay,
            filterMahabhashayakatanayay,
            filterData
        },
        children: children
    }, void 0, false, {
        fileName: "H:\\DHRUVIK\\sardhar-ashtadhyayi\\src\\utils\\ashtadhyayi\\MahabhashayakatanayayContext.js",
        lineNumber: 140,
        columnNumber: 5
    }, undefined);
};

{
  getDataFromIndexDB,
  setDataToIndexdDB,
  setGitDataToIndexdDB,
  setSanskritamWorldDataToIndexdDB,
} from "@/pages/api/api";
import axios from "axios";
import { createContext, useEffect, useState } from "react";
import Sanscript from "sanscript";

export const MahabhashayakatanayayContext = createContext();
export const MahabhashayakatanayayContextProvider = ({ children }) => {
  const [call, setCall] = useState();
  // ================  mahabhashayakatanayay STATE  ================ //
  const [filterMahabhashayakatanayay, setFilterMahabhashayakatanayay] = useState();
  const [mahabhashayakatanayay, setMahabhashayakatanayay] = useState();
  // useEffect(() => {
  //   setGitDataToIndexdDB("mahabhashayakatanayay").then(() => {
  //     setCall("mahabhashayakatanayay");
  //   });
  // }, []);

  // useEffect(() => {
  //   // ================  mahabhashayakatanayay DATA GET  ================ //
  //   getDataFromIndexDB("mahabhashayakatanayay").then((data) => {
  //     setMahabhashayakatanayay(data?.data);
  //   });
  // }, [call]);



  const diacriticsMap = {
    ā: "aa",
    ī: "ee",
    ū: "oo",
    ṛ: "ru",
    l̥: "lu",
    ṅ: "n",
    ñ: "n",
    ṭ: "t",
    ṭh: "th",
    ḍ: "d",
    ḍh: "dh",
    ṇ: "n",
    ś: "sh",
    ṣ: "sh",
    ḥ: "h",
    kṣ: "ksh",
    jñ: "dnya",
    ṁ: "m",
    "j~j": "dnya",
    "~j": "n",
    "~g": "n",
    "~lu": "lu",
    uu: "oo",
    ii: "ee",
  };
  const devanagariCache = new Map();
  const getDevanagariSearchStrings = (t) => {
    if (!t || !t.trim()) {
      return [];
    }
    if (devanagariCache.has(t)) {
      return devanagariCache.get(t);
    }
    const schemes = ["itrans", "slp1", "hk", "iast"];
    const uniqueInputs = new Set([t, t.toLowerCase()]);
    const devanagariStrings = [];
    for (const scheme of schemes) {
      for (const input of uniqueInputs) {
        if (input) {
          devanagariStrings.push(Sanscript.t(input, scheme, "devanagari"));
          if (!["a", "e", "i", "o", "u"].includes(input.slice(-1))) {
            devanagariStrings.push(
              Sanscript.t(input + "a", scheme, "devanagari")
            );
          }
        }
      }
    }
    const result = [...new Set(devanagariStrings)].filter((string) =>
      string
        .split("")
        .every(
          (char) =>
            !["a".charCodeAt(), "z".charCodeAt()].between(char.charCodeAt()) &&
            !Object.keys(diacriticsMap).includes(char) &&
            !["A".charCodeAt(), "Z".charCodeAt()].between(char.charCodeAt())
        )
    );
    devanagariCache.set(t, result);
    return result;
  };

  function checkWordsInString(mainString, wordArray) {
    for (let word of wordArray) {
      if (mainString?.includes(word)) {
        return true;
      }
    }
    return false;
  }

  const getData = async () => {
    try {
      const response = await axios.get("/api/mahabhashayakatanayay");
      setMahabhashayakatanayay(response.data);
      setFilterMahabhashayakatanayay(response.data)
      return;
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error geting data:", error);
    }
  };
  useEffect(() => {
    getData();
  }, []);

  const filterData = (val) => {
    const filteredResults = [];
    if (val) {
      mahabhashayakatanayay &&
        mahabhashayakatanayay.map((item) => {
          if (
            checkWordsInString(
              item.s?.toLowerCase(),
              getDevanagariSearchStrings(val)
            )
          ) {
            filteredResults.push(item);
          }
        });
      setFilterMahabhashayakatanayay(filteredResults);
    } else {
      setFilterMahabhashayakatanayay(mahabhashayakatanayay);
    }
  };


  return (
    <MahabhashayakatanayayContext.Provider
      value={{
        mahabhashayakatanayay,
        filterMahabhashayakatanayay,
        filterData
      }}
    >
      {children}
    </MahabhashayakatanayayContext.Provider>
  );
};

export const ShikshapatriContextProvider = ({ children  })=>{
    const [call, setCall] = useState();

    const diacriticsMap = {
        ā: "aa",
        ī: "ee",
        ū: "oo",
        ṛ: "ru",
        l̥: "lu",
        ṅ: "n",
        ñ: "n",
        ṭ: "t",
        ṭh: "th",
        ḍ: "d",
        ḍh: "dh",
        ṇ: "n",
        ś: "sh",
        ṣ: "sh",
        ḥ: "h",
        kṣ: "ksh",
        jñ: "dnya",
        ṁ: "m",
        "j~j": "dnya",
        "~j": "n",
        "~g": "n",
        "~lu": "lu",
        uu: "oo",
        ii: "ee"
    };
    const devanagariCache = new Map();
    const getDevanagariSearchStrings = (t)=>{
        if (!t || !t.trim()) {
            return [];
        }
        if (devanagariCache.has(t)) {
            return devanagariCache.get(t);
        }
        const schemes = [
            "itrans",
            "slp1",
            "hk",
            "iast"
        ];
        const uniqueInputs = new Set([
            t,
            t.toLowerCase()
        ]);
        const devanagariStrings = [];
        for (const scheme of schemes){
            for (const input of uniqueInputs){
                if (input) {
                    devanagariStrings.push(Sanscript.t(input, scheme, "devanagari"));
                    if (![
                        "a",
                        "e",
                        "i",
                        "o",
                        "u"
                    ].includes(input.slice(-1))) {
                        devanagariStrings.push(Sanscript.t(input + "a", scheme, "devanagari"));
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        const result = [
            ...new Set(devanagariStrings)
        ].filter((string)=>string.split("").every((char)=>![
                    "a".charCodeAt(),
                    "z".charCodeAt()
                ].between(char.charCodeAt()) && !Object.keys(diacriticsMap).includes(char) && ![
                    "A".charCodeAt(),
                    "Z".charCodeAt()
                ].between(char.charCodeAt())));
        devanagariCache.set(t, result);
        return result;
    };
    function checkWordsInString(mainString, wordArray) {
        for (let word of wordArray){
            if (mainString?.includes(word)) {
                return true;
            }
        }
        return false;
    }
    const getData = async ()=>{
        try {
            const response = await axios.get("/api/shikshapatri");
            setShikshapatri(response.data);
            setFilterShikshapatri(response.data);
            return;
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("Error geting data:", error);
        }
    };
    useEffect(()=>{
        getData();
    }, []);
    const filterData = (val)=>{
        const filteredResults = [];
        if (val) {
            shikshapatri && shikshapatri.map((item)=>{
                if (checkWordsInString(item.s?.toLowerCase(), getDevanagariSearchStrings(val))) {
                    filteredResults.push(item);
                }
            });
            setFilterShikshapatri(filteredResults);
        } else {
            setFilterShikshapatri(shikshapatri);
        }

getDevanagariSearchStrings(val)\r\n            )\r\n          ) {\r\n            filteredResults.push(item);\r\n          }\r\n        });\r\n      setFilterShikshapatri(filteredResults);\r\n    } const ShikshapatriContext = /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.createContext)();
const ShikshapatriContextProvider = ({ children  })=>{
    const [call, setCall] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.useState)();
    // ================  shikshapatri STATE  ================ //
    const [shikshapatri, setShikshapatri] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.useState)();
    const [filterShikshapatri, setFilterShikshapatri] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.useState)();
    const [shikshpatriBhashyam, setShikshpatriBhashyam] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.useState)();
    const [dataTab, setDataTab] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.useState)();
    // useEffect(() => {
    //   setShikshapatriDataToIndexDB("shikshapatri").then(() => {
    //     setCall("shikshapatri");
    //   });
    //   setShikshapatriDataToIndexDB("shikshpatri_bhashyam").then(() => {
    //     setCall("shikshpatri_bhashyam");
    //   });
    //   setShikshapatriDataToIndexDB("data_tab").then(() => {
    //     setCall("data_tab");
    //   });
    // }, []);
    // useEffect(() => {
    //   // ================  shikshapatri DATA GET  ================ //
    //   getDataFromIndexDB("shikshapatri").then((data) => {
    //     setShikshapatri(data?.data);
    //   });
    //   getDataFromIndexDB("shikshpatri_bhashyam").then((data) => {
    //     setShikshpatriBhashyam(data?.data);
    //   });
    //   getDataFromIndexDB("data_tab").then((data) => {
    //     setDataTab(data?.data);
    //   });
    // }, [call]);
    const diacriticsMap = {
        ā: "aa",
        ī: "ee",
        ū: "oo",
        ṛ: "ru",
        l̥: "lu",
        ṅ: "n",
        ñ: "n",
        ṭ: "t",
        ṭh: "th",
        ḍ: "d",
        ḍh: "dh",
        ṇ: "n",
        ś: "sh",
        ṣ: "sh",
        ḥ: "h",
        kṣ: "ksh",
        jñ: "dnya",
        ṁ: "m",
        "j~j": "dnya",
        "~j": "n",
        "~g": "n",
        "~lu": "lu",
        uu: "oo",
        ii: "ee"
    };
    const devanagariCache = new Map();
    const getDevanagariSearchStrings = (t)=>{
        if (!t || !t.trim()) {
            return [];
        }
        if (devanagariCache.has(t)) {
            return devanagariCache.get(t);
        }
        const schemes = [
            "itrans",
            "slp1",
            "hk",
            "iast"
        ];
        const uniqueInputs = new Set([
            t,
            t.toLowerCase()
        ]);
        const devanagariStrings = [];
        for (const scheme of schemes){
            for (const input of uniqueInputs){
                if (input) {
                    devanagariStrings.push(sanscript__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_4___default().t(input, scheme, "devanagari"));
                    if (![
                        "a",
                        "e",
                        "i",
                        "o",
                        "u"
                    ].includes(input.slice(-1))) {
                        devanagariStrings.push(sanscript__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_4___default().t(input + "a", scheme, "devanagari"));
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        const result = [
            ...new Set(devanagariStrings)
        ].filter((string)=>string.split("").every((char)=>![
                    "a".charCodeAt(),
                    "z".charCodeAt()
                ].between(char.charCodeAt()) && !Object.keys(diacriticsMap).includes(char) && ![
                    "A".charCodeAt(),
                    "Z".charCodeAt()
                ].between(char.charCodeAt())));
        devanagariCache.set(t, result);
        return result;
    };
    function checkWordsInString(mainString, wordArray) {
        for (let word of wordArray){
            if (mainString?.includes(word)) {
                return true;
            }
        }
        return false;
    }
    const getData = async ()=>{
        try {
            const response = await axios__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__["default"].get("/api/shikshapatri");
            setShikshapatri(response.data);
            setFilterShikshapatri(response.data);
            return;
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("Error geting data:", error);
        }
    };
    (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.useEffect)(()=>{
        getData();
    }, []);
    const filterData = (val)=>{
        const filteredResults = [];
        if (val) {
            shikshapatri && shikshapatri.map((item)=>{
                if (checkWordsInString(item.s?.toLowerCase(), getDevanagariSearchStrings(val))) {
                    filteredResults.push(item);
                }
            });
            setFilterShikshapatri(filteredResults);
        } else {
            setFilterShikshapatri(shikshapatri);
        }
    };
    return /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(ShikshapatriContext.Provider, {
        value: {
            shikshapatri,
            filterShikshapatri,
            shikshpatriBhashyam,
            dataTab,
            filterData
        },
        children: children
    }, void 0, false, {
        fileName: "H:\\DHRUVIK\\sardhar-ashtadhyayi\\src\\utils\\shikshapatri\\ShikshapatriContext.js",
        lineNumber: 151,
        columnNumber: 5
    }, undefined);
};

__webpack_async_result__();
} catch(e) { __webpack_async_result__(e); } });

␀␀;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;AAGyB;AACC;AACiC;AACzB;AAE3B,MAAMO,oCAAsBJ,oDAAaA,GAAG;AAC5C,MAAMK,8BAA8B,CAAC,EAAEC,SAAQ,EAAE,GAAK;IAC3D,MAAM,CAACC,MAAMC,QAAQ,GAAGN,+CAAQA;IAChC,4DAA4D;IAC5D,MAAM,CAACO,cAAcC,gBAAgB,GAAGR,+CAAQA;IAChD,MAAM,CAACS,oBAAoBC,sBAAsB,GAAGV,+CAAQA;IAC5D,MAAM,CAACW,qBAAqBC,uBAAuB,GAAGZ,+CAAQA;IAC9D,MAAM,CAACa,SAASC,WAAW,GAAGd,+CAAQA;IAEtC,oBAAoB;IACpB,8DAA8D;IAC9D,+BAA+B;IAC/B,QAAQ;IACR,sEAAsE;IACtE,uCAAuC;IACvC,QAAQ;IACR,0DAA0D;IAC1D,2BAA2B;IAC3B,QAAQ;IACR,UAAU;IAEV,oBAAoB;IACpB,oEAAoE;IACpE,wDAAwD;IACxD,mCAAmC;IACnC,QAAQ;IACR,gEAAgE;IAChE,0CAA0C;IAC1C,QAAQ;IACR,oDAAoD;IACpD,8BAA8B;IAC9B,QAAQ;IACR,cAAc;IAEd,MAAMe,gBAAgB;QACpBC,GAAG;QACHC,GAAG;QACHC,GAAG;QACHC,GAAG;QACHC,IAAI;QACJC,GAAG;QACHC,GAAG;QACHC,GAAG;QACHC,IAAI;QACJC,GAAG;QACHC,IAAI;QACJC,GAAG;QACHC,GAAG;QACHC,GAAG;QACHC,GAAG;QACHC,IAAI;QACJC,IAAI;QACJC,GAAG;QACH,OAAO;QACP,MAAM;QACN,MAAM;QACN,OAAO;QACPC,IAAI;QACJC,IAAI;IACN;IACA,MAAMC,kBAAkB,IAAIC;IAC5B,MAAMC,6BAA6B,CAACC,IAAM;QACxC,IAAI,CAACA,KAAK,CAACA,EAAEC,IAAI,IAAI;YACnB,OAAO,EAAE;QACX,CAAC;QACD,IAAIJ,gBAAgBK,GAAG,CAACF,IAAI;YAC1B,OAAOH,gBAAgBM,GAAG,CAACH;QAC7B,CAAC;QACD,MAAMI,UAAU;YAAC;YAAU;YAAQ;YAAM;SAAO;QAChD,MAAMC,eAAe,IAAIC,IAAI;YAACN;YAAGA,EAAEO,WAAW;SAAG;QACjD,MAAMC,oBAAoB,EAAE;QAC5B,KAAK,MAAMC,UAAUL,QAAS;YAC5B,KAAK,MAAMM,SAASL,aAAc;gBAChC,IAAIK,OAAO;oBACTF,kBAAkBG,IAAI,CAACjD,kDAAW,CAACgD,OAAOD,QAAQ;oBAClD,IAAI,CAAC;wBAAC;wBAAK;wBAAK;wBAAK;wBAAK;qBAAI,CAACG,QAAQ,CAACF,MAAMG,KAAK,CAAC,CAAC,KAAK;wBACxDL,kBAAkBG,IAAI,CACpBjD,kDAAW,CAACgD,QAAQ,KAAKD,QAAQ;oBAErC,CAAC;gBACH,CAAC;YACH;QACF;QACA,MAAMK,SAAS;eAAI,IAAIR,IAAIE;SAAmB,CAACO,MAAM,CAAC,CAACC,SACrDA,OACGC,KAAK,CAAC,IACNC,KAAK,CACJ,CAACC,OACC,CAAC;oBAAC,IAAIC,UAAU;oBAAI,IAAIA,UAAU;iBAAG,CAACC,OAAO,CAACF,KAAKC,UAAU,OAC7D,CAACE,OAAOC,IAAI,CAAC/C,eAAeoC,QAAQ,CAACO,SACrC,CAAC;oBAAC,IAAIC,UAAU;oBAAI,IAAIA,UAAU;iBAAG,CAACC,OAAO,CAACF,KAAKC,UAAU;QAGrEvB,gBAAgB2B,GAAG,CAACxB,GAAGc;QACvB,OAAOA;IACT;IAEA,SAASW,mBAAmBC,UAAU,EAAEC,SAAS,EAAE;QACjD,KAAK,IAAIC,QAAQD,UAAW;YAC1B,IAAID,YAAYd,SAASgB,OAAO;gBAC9B,OAAO,IAAI;YACb,CAAC;QACH;QACA,OAAO,KAAK;IACd;IAEA,MAAMC,UAAU,UAAY;QAC1B,IAAI;YACF,MAAMC,WAAW,MAAMxE,iDAAS,CAAC;YACjCW,gBAAgB6D,SAASC,IAAI;YAC7B5D,sBAAsB2D,SAASC,IAAI;YACnC;QACF,EAAE,OAAOC,OAAO;YACdC,QAAQD,KAAK,CAAC,sBAAsBA;QACtC;IACF;IAEAxE,gDAASA,CAAC,IAAM;QACdqE;IACF,GAAG,EAAE;IAEL,MAAMK,aAAa,CAACC,MAAQ;QAC1B,MAAMC,kBAAkB,EAAE;QAC1B,IAAID,KAAK;YACPnE,gBACEA,aAAaqE,GAAG,CAAC,CAACC,OAAS;gBACzB,IACEb,mBACEa,KAAKC,CAAC,EAAEhC,eACRR,2BAA2BoC,OAE7B;oBACAC,gBAAgBzB,IAAI,CAAC2B;gBACvB,CAAC;YACH;YACFnE,sBAAsBiE;QACxB,OAAO;YACLjE,sBAAsBH;QACxB,CAAC;IACH;IAEA,qBACE,8DAACL,oBAAoB6E,QAAQ;QAC3BC,OAAO;YACLzE;YACAE;YACAE;YACAE;YACA4D;QACF;kBAECrE;;;;;;AAGP,EAAEwebpack://./src/utils/shikshapatri/ShikshapatriContext.jsb␀␀import {
  getDataFromIndexDB,
  setShikshapatriDataToIndexDB,
} from "@/pages/api/api";
import axios from "axios";
import { createContext, useEffect, useState } from "react";
import Sanscript from "sanscript";

export const ShikshapatriContext = createContext();
export const ShikshapatriContextProvider = ({ children }) => {
  const [call, setCall] = useState();
  // ================  shikshapatri STATE  ================ //
  const [shikshapatri, setShikshapatri] = useState();
  const [filterShikshapatri, setFilterShikshapatri] = useState();
  const [shikshpatriBhashyam, setShikshpatriBhashyam] = useState();
  const [dataTab, setDataTab] = useState();

  // useEffect(() => {
  //   setShikshapatriDataToIndexDB("shikshapatri").then(() => {
  //     setCall("shikshapatri");
  //   });
  //   setShikshapatriDataToIndexDB("shikshpatri_bhashyam").then(() => {
  //     setCall("shikshpatri_bhashyam");
  //   });
  //   setShikshapatriDataToIndexDB("data_tab").then(() => {
  //     setCall("data_tab");
  //   });
  // }, []);

  // useEffect(() => {
  //   // ================  shikshapatri DATA GET  ================ //
  //   getDataFromIndexDB("shikshapatri").then((data) => {
  //     setShikshapatri(data?.data);
  //   });
  //   getDataFromIndexDB("shikshpatri_bhashyam").then((data) => {
  //     setShikshpatriBhashyam(data?.data);
  //   });
  //   getDataFromIndexDB("data_tab").then((data) => {
  //     setDataTab(data?.data);
  //   });
  // }, [call]);

  const diacriticsMap = {
    ā: "aa",
    ī: "ee",
    ū: "oo",
    ṛ: "ru",
    l̥: "lu",
    ṅ: "n",
    ñ: "n",
    ṭ: "t",
    ṭh: "th",
    ḍ: "d",
    ḍh: "dh",
    ṇ: "n",
    ś: "sh",
    ṣ: "sh",
    ḥ: "h",
    kṣ: "ksh",
    jñ: "dnya",
    ṁ: "m",
    "j~j": "dnya",
    "~j": "n",
    "~g": "n",
    "~lu": "lu",
    uu: "oo",
    ii: "ee",
  };
  const devanagariCache = new Map();
  const getDevanagariSearchStrings = (t) => {
    if (!t || !t.trim()) {
      return [];
    }
    if (devanagariCache.has(t)) {
      return devanagariCache.get(t);
    }
    const schemes = ["itrans", "slp1", "hk", "iast"];
    const uniqueInputs = new Set([t, t.toLowerCase()]);
    const devanagariStrings = [];
    for (const scheme of schemes) {
      for (const input of uniqueInputs) {
        if (input) {
          devanagariStrings.push(Sanscript.t(input, scheme, "devanagari"));
          if (!["a", "e", "i", "o", "u"].includes(input.slice(-1))) {
            devanagariStrings.push(
              Sanscript.t(input + "a", scheme, "devanagari")
            );
          }
        }
      }
    }
    const result = [...new Set(devanagariStrings)].filter((string) =>
      string
        .split("")
        .every(
          (char) =>
            !["a".charCodeAt(), "z".charCodeAt()].between(char.charCodeAt()) &&
            !Object.keys(diacriticsMap).includes(char) &&
            !["A".charCodeAt(), "Z".charCodeAt()].between(char.charCodeAt())
        )
    );
    devanagariCache.set(t, result);
    return result;
  };

  function checkWordsInString(mainString, wordArray) {
    for (let word of wordArray) {
      if (mainString?.includes(word)) {
        return true;
      }
    }
    return false;
  }

  const getData = async () => {
    try {
      const response = await axios.get("/api/shikshapatri");
      setShikshapatri(response.data);
      setFilterShikshapatri(response.data);
      return;
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error geting data:", error);
    }
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    getData();
  }, []);

  const filterData = (val) => {
    const filteredResults = [];
    if (val) {
      shikshapatri &&
        shikshapatri.map((item) => {
          if (
            checkWordsInString(
              item.s?.toLowerCase(),
              getDevanagariSearchStrings(val)
            )
          ) {
            filteredResults.push(item);
          }
        });
      setFilterShikshapatri(filteredResults);
    } else {
      setFilterShikshapatri(shikshapatri);
    }
  };

  return (
    <ShikshapatriContext.Provider
      value={{
        shikshapatri,
        filterShikshapatri,
        shikshpatriBhashyam,
        dataTab,
        filterData,
      }}
    >
      {children}
    </ShikshapatriContext.Provider>
  );
};

webpack/lib/util/registerExternalSerializerwebpack-sources/ReplaceSourcewebpack/lib/util/registerExternalSerializerwebpack-sources/SourceMapSource␀␀import { jsxDEV as _jsxDEV } from "react/jsx-dev-runtime";
import axios from "axios";
import { useRouter } from "next/router";
import { createContext, useEffect, useState } from "react";
import Sanscript from "sanscript";
export const VachnamrutContext = /*#__PURE__*/ createContext();
export const VachnamrutContextProvider = ({ children  })=>{
    const router = useRouter();
    // ================  vachnamrut STATE  ================ //
    const [currentVachnamrut, setCurrentVachnamrut] = useState();
    const [vachnamrutList, setVachnamrutList] = useState();
    const [vachnamrut_gu, setVachnamrutGu] = useState();
    const [vachnamrut_en, setVachnamrutEn] = useState();
    const [vachnamrut_hi, setVachnamrutHi] = useState();
    const [vachnamrut_sa, setVachnamrutSa] = useState();
    const [vachnamrut_setumala, setVachnamrutSetumala] = useState();
    const [vachnamrut_harimulam, setVachnamrutHarimulam] = useState();
    const [currentVachnamrut_gu, setCurrentVachnamrut_gu] = useState();
    const [currentVachnamrut_en, setCurrentVachnamrut_en] = useState();
    const [currentVachnamrut_hi, setCurrentVachnamrut_hi] = useState();
    const [currentVachnamrut_sa, setCurrentVachnamrut_sa] = useState();
    const [currentVachnamrut_harimulam, setCurrentVachnamrut_harimulam] = useState();
    const [currentVachnamrut_setumala, setCurrentVachnamrut_setumala] = useState();
    const [filterVachnamrut, setFilterVachnamrut] = useState();
    const diacriticsMap = {
        ā: "aa",
        ī: "ee",
        ū: "oo",
        ṛ: "ru",
        l̥: "lu",
        ṅ: "n",
        ñ: "n",
        ṭ: "t",
        ṭh: "th",
        ḍ: "d",
        ḍh: "dh",
        ṇ: "n",
        ś: "sh",
        ṣ: "sh",
        ḥ: "h",
        kṣ: "ksh",
        jñ: "dnya",
        ṁ: "m",
        "j~j": "dnya",
        "~j": "n",
        "~g": "n",
        "~lu": "lu",
        uu: "oo",
        ii: "ee"
    };
    const devanagariCache = new Map();
    const getDevanagariSearchStrings = (t)=>{
        if (!t || !t.trim()) {
            return [];
        }
        if (devanagariCache.has(t)) {
            return devanagariCache.get(t);
        }
        const schemes = [
            "itrans",
            "slp1",
            "hk",
            "iast"
        ];
        const uniqueInputs = new Set([
            t,
            t.toLowerCase()
        ]);
        const devanagariStrings = [];
        for (const scheme of schemes){
            for (const input of uniqueInputs){
                if (input) {
                    devanagariStrings.push(Sanscript.t(input, scheme, "devanagari"));
                    if (![
                        "a",
                        "e",
                        "i",
                        "o",
                        "u"
                    ].includes(input.slice(-1))) {
                        devanagariStrings.push(Sanscript.t(input + "a", scheme, "devanagari"));
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        const result = [
            ...new Set(devanagariStrings)
        ].filter((string)=>string.split("").every((char)=>![
                    "a".charCodeAt(),
                    "z".charCodeAt()
                ].between(char.charCodeAt()) && !Object.keys(diacriticsMap).includes(char) && ![
                    "A".charCodeAt(),
                    "Z".charCodeAt()
                ].between(char.charCodeAt())));
        devanagariCache.set(t, result);
        return result;
    };
    function checkWordsInString(mainString, wordArray) {
        for (let word of wordArray){
            if (mainString?.includes(word)) {
                return true;
            }
        }
        return false;
    }
    const [tabs, setTabs] = useState([
        {
            name: "ગુજરાતી",
            val: "gu"
        },
        {
            name: "हिंदी",
            val: "hi"
        },
        {
            name: "English",
            val: "en"
        },
        {
            name: "संस्कृत",
            val: "sa"
        },
        {
            name: "श्रीहरिवाक्यसुधासिन्धुः - मूलम्",
            val: "harimulam"
        }
    ]);
    const vachnamrutLang = {
        gu: {
            name: "ગુજરાતી",
            val: "gu"
        },
        hi: {
            name: "हिंदी",
            val: "hi"
        },
        en: {
            name: "English",
            val: "en"
        },
        sa: {
            name: "संस्कृत",
            val: "sa"
        },
        harimulam: {
            name: "श्रीहरिवाक्यसुधासिन्धुः - मूलम्",
            val: "harimulam"
        }
    };
    const handleTab = (type)=>{
        const currentLanguage = tabs.find((tab)=>router.asPath.includes(tab.val))?.val;
        if (currentLanguage && currentLanguage !== type) {
            const newPath = router.asPath.replace(currentLanguage, type);
            router.push({
                pathname: newPath
            });
        }
    };
    const getData = async ()=>{
        try {
            const response_gu = await axios.get("/api/vachnamrut/gu");
            const response_en = await axios.get("/api/vachnamrut/en");
            const response_hi = await axios.get("/api/vachnamrut/hi");
            const response_sa = await axios.get("/api/vachnamrut/sa");
            const response_setumala = await axios.get("/api/vachnamrut/setumala");
            const response_harimulam = await axios.get("/api/vachnamrut/harimulam");
            setVachnamrutGu(response_gu.data);
            setVachnamrutEn(response_en.data);
            setVachnamrutHi(response_hi.data);
            setVachnamrutSa(response_sa.data);
            setVachnamrutSetumala(response_setumala.data);
            setVachnamrutHarimulam(response_harimulam.data);
            // setFilterVachnamrut(response.data);
            return;
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("Error geting data:", error);
        }
    };
    const getVachnamrutList = async ()=>{
        try {
            const response = await axios.get("/api/vachnamrut");
            setVachnamrutList(response.data);
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("Error get Vachnamrut List:", error);
        }
    };
    useEffect(()=>{
        // getData();
        getVachnamrutList();
    }, []);
    const filterData = (val)=>{
        const filteredResults = [];
        if (val) {
            shikshapatri && shikshapatri.map((item)=>{
                if (checkWordsInString(item.s?.toLowerCase(), getDevanagariSearchStrings(val))) {
                    filteredResults.push(item);
                }
            });
            setFilterShikshapatri(filteredResults);
        } else {
            setFilterShikshapatri(shikshapatri);
        }
    };
    return /*#__PURE__*/ _jsxDEV(VachnamrutContext.Provider, {
        value: {
            vachnamrut_en,
            vachnamrut_gu,
            vachnamrut_hi,
            vachnamrut_sa,
            vachnamrut_setumala,
            vachnamrut_harimulam,
            filterVachnamrut,
            currentVachnamrut_gu,
            setCurrentVachnamrut_gu,
            currentVachnamrut_en,
            setCurrentVachnamrut_en,
            currentVachnamrut_hi,
            setCurrentVachnamrut_hi,
            currentVachnamrut_sa,
            setCurrentVachnamrut_sa,
            currentVachnamrut_setumala,
            setCurrentVachnamrut_setumala,
            currentVachnamrut_harimulam,
            setCurrentVachnamrut_harimulam,
            vachnamrutList,
            setVachnamrutList,
            currentVachnamrut,
            setCurrentVachnamrut,
            filterData,
            handleTab,
            tabs,
            vachnamrutLang
        },
        children: children
    }, void 0, false, {
        fileName: "H:\\DHRUVIK\\sardhar-ashtadhyayi\\src\\utils\\vachnamrut\\VachnamrutContext.js",

    }, this);
};
␀␀␀webpack://./node_modules/next/dist/build/webpack/loaders/next-swc-loader.js??ruleSet[1].rules[1].oneOf[2].use!./src/utils/vachnamrut/VachnamrutContext.js5␀␀{"version":3,"sources":["webpack://./src/utils/vachnamrut/VachnamrutContext.js"],"sourcesContent":["import axios from \"axios\";\r\nimport { useRouter } from \"next/router\";\r\nimport { createContext, useEffect, useState } from \"react\";\r\nimport Sanscript from \"sanscript\";\r\n\r\nexport const VachnamrutContext = createContext();\r\nexport const VachnamrutContextProvider = ({ children }) => {\r\n  const router = useRouter();\r\n  // ================  vachnamrut STATE  ================ //\r\n  const [currentVachnamrut, setCurrentVachnamrut] = useState();\r\n  const [vachnamrutList, setVachnamrutList] = useState();\r\n  const [vachnamrut_gu, setVachnamrutGu] = useState();\r\n  const [vachnamrut_en, setVachnamrutEn] = useState();\r\n  const [vachnamrut_hi, setVachnamrutHi] = useState();\r\n  const [vachnamrut_sa, setVachnamrutSa] = useState();\r\n  const [vachnamrut_setumala, setVachnamrutSetumala] = useState();\r\n  const [vachnamrut_harimulam, setVachnamrutHarimulam] = useState();\r\n  const [currentVachnamrut_gu, setCurrentVachnamrut_gu] = useState();\r\n  const [currentVachnamrut_en, setCurrentVachnamrut_en] = useState();\r\n  const [currentVachnamrut_hi, setCurrentVachnamrut_hi] = useState();\r\n  const [currentVachnamrut_sa, setCurrentVachnamrut_sa] = useState();\r\n  const [currentVachnamrut_harimulam, setCurrentVachnamrut_harimulam] =\r\n    useState();\r\n  const [currentVachnamrut_setumala, setCurrentVachnamrut_setumala] =\r\n    useState();\r\n  const [filterVachnamrut, setFilterVachnamrut] = useState();\r\n\r\n  const diacriticsMap = {\r\n    ā: \"aa\",\r\n    ī: \"ee\",\r\n    ū: \"oo\",\r\n    ṛ: \"ru\",\r\n    l̥: \"lu\",\r\n    ṅ: \"n\",\r\n    ñ: \"n\",\r\n    ṭ: \"t\",\r\n    ṭh: \"th\",\r\n    ḍ: \"d\",\r\n    ḍh: \"dh\",\r\n    ṇ: \"n\",\r\n    ś: \"sh\",\r\n    ṣ: \"sh\",\r\n    ḥ: \"h\",\r\n    kṣ: \"ksh\",\r\n    jñ: \"dnya\",\r\n    ṁ: \"m\",\r\n    \"j~j\": \"dnya\",\r\n    \"~j\": \"n\",\r\n    \"~g\": \"n\",\r\n    \"~lu\": \"lu\",\r\n    uu: \"oo\",\r\n    ii: \"ee\",\r\n  };\r\n  const devanagariCache = new Map();\r\n  const getDevanagariSearchStrings = (t) => {\r\n    if (!t || !t.trim()) {\r\n      return [];\r\n    }\r\n    if (devanagariCache.has(t)) {\r\n      return devanagariCache.get(t);\r\n    }\r\n    const schemes = [\"itrans\", \"slp1\", \"hk\", \"iast\"];\r\n    const uniqueInputs = new Set([t, t.toLowerCase()]);\r\n    const devanagariStrings = [];\r\n    for (const scheme of schemes) {\r\n      for (const input of uniqueInputs) {\r\n        if (input) {\r\n          devanagariStrings.push(Sanscript.t(input, scheme, \"devanagari\"));\r\n          if (![\"a\", \"e\", \"i\", \"o\", \"u\"].includes(input.slice(-1))) {\r\n            devanagariStrings.push(\r\n              Sanscript.t(input + \"a\", scheme, \"devanagari\")\r\n            );\r\n          }\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n    }\r\n    const result = [...new Set(devanagariStrings)].filter((string) =>\r\n      string\r\n        .split(\"\")\r\n        .every(\r\n          (char) =>\r\n            ![\"a\".charCodeAt(), \"z\".charCodeAt()].between(char.charCodeAt()) &&\r\n            !Object.keys(diacriticsMap).includes(char) &&\r\n            ![\"A\".charCodeAt(), \"Z\".charCodeAt()].between(char.charCodeAt())\r\n        )\r\n    );\r\n    devanagariCache.set(t, result);\r\n    return result;\r\n  };\r\n\r\n  function checkWordsInString(mainString, wordArray) {\r\n    for (let word of wordArray) {\r\n      if (mainString?.includes(word)) {\r\n        return true;\r\n      }\r\n    }\r\n    return false;\r\n  }\r\n\r\n  const [tabs, setTabs] = useState([\r\n    { name: \"ગુજરાતી\", val: \"gu\" },\r\n    { name: \"हिंदी\", val: \"hi\" },\r\n    { name: \"English\", val: \"en\" },\r\n    { name: \"संस्कृत\", val: \"sa\" },\r\n    { name: \"श्रीहरिवाक्यसुधासिन्धुः - मूलम्\", val: \"harimulam\" },\r\n    // { name: \"श्रीहरिवाक्यसुधासिन्धुः - सेतुमालाटीकासहितः\", val: \"setumala\" },\r\n  ]);\r\n  const vachnamrutLang = {\r\n    gu: { name: \"ગુજરાતી\", val: \"gu\" },\r\n    hi: { name: \"हिंदी\", val: \"hi\" },\r\n    en: { name: \"English\", val: \"en\" },\r\n    sa: { name: \"संस्कृत\", val: \"sa\" },\r\n    harimulam: { name: \"श्रीहरिवाक्यसुधासिन्धुः - मूलम्\", val: \"harimulam\" },\r\n  };\r\n\r\n  const handleTab = (type) => {\r\n    const currentLanguage = tabs.find((tab) =>\r\n      router.asPath.includes(tab.val)\r\n    )?.val;\r\n    if (currentLanguage && currentLanguage !== type) {\r\n      const newPath = router.asPath.replace(currentLanguage, type);\r\n      router.push({ pathname: newPath });\r\n    }\r\n  };\r\n\r\n  const getData = async () => {\r\n    try {\r\n      const response_gu = await axios.get(\"/api/vachnamrut/gu\");\r\n      const response_en = await axios.get(\"/api/vachnamrut/en\");\r\n      const response_hi = await axios.get(\"/api/vachnamrut/hi\");\r\n      const response_sa = await axios.get(\"/api/vachnamrut/sa\");\r\n      const response_setumala = await axios.get(\"/api/vachnamrut/setumala\");\r\n      const response_harimulam = await axios.get(\"/api/vachnamrut/harimulam\");\r\n      setVachnamrutGu(response_gu.data);\r\n      setVachnamrutEn(response_en.data);\r\n      setVachnamrutHi(response_hi.data);\r\n      setVachnamrutSa(response_sa.data);\r\n      setVachnamrutSetumala(response_setumala.data);\r\n      setVachnamrutHarimulam(response_harimulam.data);\r\n      // setFilterVachnamrut(response.data);\r\n      return;\r\n    } catch (error) {\r\n      console.error(\"Error geting data:\", error);\r\n    }\r\n  };\r\n\r\n  const getVachnamrutList = async () => {\r\n    try {\r\n      const response = await axios.get(\"/api/vachnamrut\");\r\n      setVachnamrutList(response.data);\r\n    } catch (error) {\r\n      console.error(\"Error get Vachnamrut List:\", error);\r\n    }\r\n  };\r\n\r\n  useEffect(() => {\r\n    // getData();\r\n    getVachnamrutList();\r\n  }, []);\r\n\r\n  const filterData = (val) => {\r\n    const filteredResults = [];\r\n    if (val) {\r\n      shikshapatri &&\r\n        shikshapatri.map((item) => {\r\n          if (\r\n            checkWordsInString(\r\n              item.s?.toLowerCase(),\r\n              getDevanagariSearchStrings(val)\r\n            )\r\n          ) {\r\n            filteredResults.push(item);\r\n          }\r\n        });\r\n      setFilterShikshapatri(filteredResults);\r\n    } else {\r\n      setFilterShikshapatri(shikshapatri);\r\n    }\r\n  };\r\n\r\n  return (\r\n    <VachnamrutContext.Provider\r\n      value={{\r\n        vachnamrut_en,\r\n        vachnamrut_gu,\r\n        vachnamrut_hi,\r\n        vachnamrut_sa,\r\n        vachnamrut_setumala,\r\n        vachnamrut_harimulam,\r\n        filterVachnamrut,\r\n        currentVachnamrut_gu,\r\n        setCurrentVachnamrut_gu,\r\n        currentVachnamrut_en,\r\n        setCurrentVachnamrut_en,\r\n        currentVachnamrut_hi,\r\n        setCurrentVachnamrut_hi,\r\n        currentVachnamrut_sa,\r\n        setCurrentVachnamrut_sa,\r\n        currentVachnamrut_setumala,\r\n        setCurrentVachnamrut_setumala,\r\n        currentVachnamrut_harimulam,\r\n        setCurrentVachnamrut_harimulam,\r\n        vachnamrutList,\r\n        setVachnamrutList,\r\n        currentVachnamrut,\r\n        setCurrentVachnamrut,\r\n        filterData,\r\n        handleTab,\r\n        tabs,\r\n        vachnamrutLang\r\n      }}\r\n    >\r\n      {children}\r\n    </VachnamrutContext.Provider>\r\n  );\r\n};\r\n"],"names":["axios","useRouter","createContext","useEffect","useState","Sanscript","VachnamrutContext","VachnamrutContextProvider","children","router","currentVachnamrut","setCurrentVachnamrut","vachnamrutList","setVachnamrutList","vachnamrut_gu","setVachnamrutGu","vachnamrut_en","setVachnamrutEn","vachnamrut_hi","setVachnamrutHi","vachnamrut_sa","setVachnamrutSa","vachnamrut_setumala","setVachnamrutSetumala","vachnamrut_harimulam","setVachnamrutHarimulam","currentVachnamrut_gu","setCurrentVachnamrut_gu","currentVachnamrut_en","setCurrentVachnamrut_en","currentVachnamrut_hi","setCurrentVachnamrut_hi","currentVachnamrut_sa","setCurrentVachnamrut_sa","currentVachnamrut_harimulam","setCurrentVachnamrut_harimulam","currentVachnamrut_setumala","setCurrentVachnamrut_setumala","filterVachnamrut","setFilterVachnamrut","diacriticsMap","ā","ī","ū","ṛ","l̥","ṅ","ñ","ṭ","ṭh","ḍ","ḍh","ṇ","ś","ṣ","ḥ","kṣ","jñ","ṁ","uu","ii","devanagariCache","Map","getDevanagariSearchStrings","t","trim","has","get","schemes","uniqueInputs","Set","toLowerCase","devanagariStrings","scheme","input","push","includes","slice","result","filter","string","split","every","char","charCodeAt","between","Object","keys","set","checkWordsInString","mainString","wordArray","word","tabs","setTabs","name","val","vachnamrutLang","gu","hi","en","sa","harimulam","handleTab","type","currentLanguage","find","tab","asPath","newPath","replace","pathname","getData","response_gu","response_en","response_hi","response_sa","response_setumala","response_harimulam","data","error","console","getVachnamrutList","response","filterData","filteredResults","shikshapatri","map","item","s","setFilterShikshapatri","Provider","value"],"mappings":";AAAA,OAAOA,WAAW,QAAQ;AAC1B,SAASC,SAAS,QAAQ,cAAc;AACxC,SAASC,aAAa,EAAEC,SAAS,EAAEC,QAAQ,QAAQ,QAAQ;AAC3D,OAAOC,eAAe,YAAY;AAElC,OAAO,MAAMC,kCAAoBJ,gBAAgB;AACjD,OAAO,MAAMK,4BAA4B,CAAC,EAAEC,SAAQ,EAAE,GAAK;IACzD,MAAMC,SAASR;IACf,0DAA0D;IAC1D,MAAM,CAACS,mBAAmBC,qBAAqB,GAAGP;IAClD,MAAM     const [vachnamrut_harimulam, setVachnamrutHarimulam] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.useState)();
    const [currentVachnamrut_gu, setCurrentVachnamrut_gu] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.useState)();
    const [currentVachnamrut_en, setCurrentVachnamrut_en] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.useState)();
    const [currentVachnamrut_hi, setCurrentVachnamrut_hi] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.useState)();
    const [currentVachnamrut_sa, setCurrentVachnamrut_sa] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.useState)();
    const [currentVachnamrut_harimulam, setCurrentVachnamrut_harimulam] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.useState)();
    const [currentVachnamrut_setumala, setCurrentVachnamrut_setumala] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.useState)();
    const [filterVachnamrut, setFilterVachnamrut] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.useState)();
    const diacriticsMap = {
        ā: "aa",
        ī: "ee",
        ū: "oo",
        ṛ: "ru",
        l̥: "lu",
        ṅ: "n",
        ñ: "n",
        ṭ: "t",
        ṭh: "th",
        ḍ: "d",
        ḍh: "dh",
        ṇ: "n",
        ś: "sh",
        ṣ: "sh",
        ḥ: "h",
        kṣ: "ksh",
        jñ: "dnya",
        ṁ: "m",
        "j~j": "dnya",
        "~j": "n",
        "~g": "n",
        "~lu": "lu",
        uu: "oo",
        ii: "ee"
    };
    const devanagariCache = new Map();
    const getDevanagariSearchStrings = (t)=>{
        if (!t || !t.trim()) {
            return [];
        }
        if (devanagariCache.has(t)) {
            return devanagariCache.get(t);
        }
        const schemes = [
            "itrans",
            "slp1",
            "hk",
            "iast"
        ];
        const uniqueInputs = new Set([
            t,
            t.toLowerCase()
        ]);
        const devanagariStrings = [];
        for (const scheme of schemes){
            for (const input of uniqueInputs){
                if (input) {
                    devanagariStrings.push(sanscript__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_4___default().t(input, scheme, "devanagari"));
                    if (![
                        "a",
                        "e",
                        "i",
                        "o",
                        "u"
                    ].includes(input.slice(-1))) {
                        devanagariStrings.push(sanscript__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_4___default().t(input + "a", scheme, "devanagari"));
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        const result = [
            ...new Set(devanagariStrings)
        ].filter((string)=>string.split("").every((char)=>![
                    "a".charCodeAt(),
                    "z".charCodeAt()
                ].between(char.charCodeAt()) && !Object.keys(diacriticsMap).includes(char) && ![
                    "A".charCodeAt(),
                    "Z".charCodeAt()
                ].between(char.charCodeAt())));
        devanagariCache.set(t, result);
        return result;
    };
    function checkWordsInString(mainString, wordArray) {
        for (let word of wordArray){
            if (mainString?.includes(word)) {
                return true;
            }
        }
        return false;
    }
    const [tabs, setTabs] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.useState)([
        {
            name: "ગુજરાતી",
            val: "gu"
        },
        {
            name: "हिंदी",
            val: "hi"
        },
        {
            name: "English",
            val: "en"
        },
        {
            name: "संस्कृत",
            val: "sa"
        },
        {
            name: "श्रीहरिवाक्यसुधासिन्धुः - मूलम्",
            val: "harimulam"
        }
    ]);
    const vachnamrutLang = {
        gu: {
            name: "ગુજરાતી",
            val: "gu"
        },
        hi: {
            name: "हिंदी",
            val: "hi"
        },
        en: {
            name: "English",
            val: "en"
        },
        sa: {
            name: "संस्कृत",
            val: "sa"
        },
        harimulam: {
            name: "श्रीहरिवाक्यसुधासिन्धुः - मूलम्",
            val: "harimulam"
        }
    };
    const handleTab = (type)=>{
        const currentLanguage = tabs.find((tab)=>router.asPath.includes(tab.val))?.val;
        if (currentLanguage && currentLanguage !== type) {
            const newPath = router.asPath.replace(currentLanguage, type);
            router.push({
                pathname: newPath
            });
        }
    };
    const getData = async ()=>{
        try {
            const response_gu = await axios__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__["default"].get("/api/vachnamrut/gu");
            const response_en = await axios__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__["default"].get("/api/vachnamrut/en");
            const response_hi = await axios__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__["default"].get("/api/vachnamrut/hi");
            const response_sa = await axios__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__["default"].get("/api/vachnamrut/sa");
            const response_setumala = await axios__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__["default"].get("/api/vachnamrut/setumala");
            const response_harimulam = await axios__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__["default"].get("/api/vachnamrut/harimulam");
            setVachnamrutGu(response_gu.data);
            setVachnamrutEn(response_en.data);
            setVachnamrutHi(response_hi.data);
            setVachnamrutSa(response_sa.data);
            setVachnamrutSetumala(response_setumala.data);
            setVachnamrutHarimulam(response_harimulam.data);
            // setFilterVachnamrut(response.data);
            return;
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("Error geting data:", error);
        }
    };
    const getVachnamrutList = async ()=>{
        try {
            const response = await axios__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__["default"].get("/api/vachnamrut");
            setVachnamrutList(response.data);
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("Error get Vachnamrut List:", error);
        }
    };
    (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.useEffect)(()=>{
        // getData();
        getVachnamrutList();
    }, []);
    const filterData = (val)=>{
        const filteredResults = [];
        if (val) {
            shikshapatri && shikshapatri.map((item)=>{
                if (checkWordsInString(item.s?.toLowerCase(), getDevanagariSearchStrings(val))) {
                    filteredResults.push(item);
                }
            });
            setFilterShikshapatri(filteredResults);
        } else {
            setFilterShikshapatri(shikshapatri);
        }
    };
    return /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(VachnamrutContext.Provider, {
        value: {
            vachnamrut_en,
            vachnamrut_gu,
            vachnamrut_hi,
            vachnamrut_sa,
            vachnamrut_setumala,
            vachnamrut_harimulam,
            filterVachnamrut,
            currentVachnamrut_gu,
            setCurrentVachnamrut_gu,
            currentVachnamrut_en,
            setCurrentVachnamrut_en,
            currentVachnamrut_hi,
            setCurrentVachnamrut_hi,
            currentVachnamrut_sa,
            setCurrentVachnamrut_sa,
            currentVachnamrut_setumala,
            setCurrentVachnamrut_setumala,
            currentVachnamrut_harimulam,

axios from "axios";
import { useRouter } from "next/router";
import { createContext, useEffect, useState } from "react";
import Sanscript from "sanscript";

export const VachnamrutContext = createContext();
export const VachnamrutContextProvider = ({ children }) => {
  const router = useRouter();
  // ================  vachnamrut STATE  ================ //
  const [currentVachnamrut, setCurrentVachnamrut] = useState();
  const [vachnamrutList, setVachnamrutList] = useState();
  const [vachnamrut_gu, setVachnamrutGu] = useState();
  const [vachnamrut_en, setVachnamrutEn] = useState();
  const [vachnamrut_hi, setVachnamrutHi] = useState();
  const [vachnamrut_sa, setVachnamrutSa] = useState();
  const [vachnamrut_setumala, setVachnamrutSetumala] = useState();
  const [vachnamrut_harimulam, setVachnamrutHarimulam] = useState();
  const [currentVachnamrut_gu, setCurrentVachnamrut_gu] = useState();
  const [currentVachnamrut_en, setCurrentVachnamrut_en] = useState();
  const [currentVachnamrut_hi, setCurrentVachnamrut_hi] = useState();
  const [currentVachnamrut_sa, setCurrentVachnamrut_sa] = useState();
  const [currentVachnamrut_harimulam, setCurrentVachnamrut_harimulam] =
    useState();
  const [currentVachnamrut_setumala, setCurrentVachnamrut_setumala] =
    useState();
  const [filterVachnamrut, setFilterVachnamrut] = useState();

  const diacriticsMap = {
    ā: "aa",
    ī: "ee",
    ū: "oo",
    ṛ: "ru",
    l̥: "lu",
    ṅ: "n",
    ñ: "n",
    ṭ: "t",
    ṭh: "th",
    ḍ: "d",
    ḍh: "dh",
    ṇ: "n",
    ś: "sh",
    ṣ: "sh",
    ḥ: "h",
    kṣ: "ksh",
    jñ: "dnya",
    ṁ: "m",
    "j~j": "dnya",
    "~j": "n",
    "~g": "n",
    "~lu": "lu",
    uu: "oo",
    ii: "ee",
  };
  const devanagariCache = new Map();
  const getDevanagariSearchStrings = (t) => {
    if (!t || !t.trim()) {
      return [];
    }
    if (devanagariCache.has(t)) {
      return devanagariCache.get(t);
    }
    const schemes = ["itrans", "slp1", "hk", "iast"];
    const uniqueInputs = new Set([t, t.toLowerCase()]);
    const devanagariStrings = [];
    for (const scheme of schemes) {
      for (const input of uniqueInputs) {
        if (input) {
          devanagariStrings.push(Sanscript.t(input, scheme, "devanagari"));
          if (!["a", "e", "i", "o", "u"].includes(input.slice(-1))) {
            devanagariStrings.push(
              Sanscript.t(input + "a", scheme, "devanagari")
            );
          }
        }
      }
    }
    const result = [...new Set(devanagariStrings)].filter((string) =>
      string
        .split("")
        .every(
          (char) =>
            !["a".charCodeAt(), "z".charCodeAt()].between(char.charCodeAt()) &&
            !Object.keys(diacriticsMap).includes(char) &&
            !["A".charCodeAt(), "Z".charCodeAt()].between(char.charCodeAt())
        )
    );
    devanagariCache.set(t, result);
    return result;
  };

  function checkWordsInString(mainString, wordArray) {
    for (let word of wordArray) {
      if (mainString?.includes(word)) {
        return true;
      }
    }
    return false;
  }

  const [tabs, setTabs] = useState([
    { name: "ગુજરાતી", val: "gu" },
    { name: "हिंदी", val: "hi" },
    { name: "English", val: "en" },
    { name: "संस्कृत", val: "sa" },
    { name: "श्रीहरिवाक्यसुधासिन्धुः - मूलम्", val: "harimulam" },
    // { name: "श्रीहरिवाक्यसुधासिन्धुः - सेतुमालाटीकासहितः", val: "setumala" },
  ]);
  const vachnamrutLang = {
    gu: { name: "ગુજરાતી", val: "gu" },
    hi: { name: "हिंदी", val: "hi" },
    en: { name: "English", val: "en" },
    sa: { name: "संस्कृत", val: "sa" },
    harimulam: { name: "श्रीहरिवाक्यसुधासिन्धुः - मूलम्", val: "harimulam" },
  };

  const handleTab = (type) => {
    const currentLanguage = tabs.find((tab) =>
      router.asPath.includes(tab.val)
    )?.val;
    if (currentLanguage && currentLanguage !== type) {
      const newPath = router.asPath.replace(currentLanguage, type);
      router.push({ pathname: newPath });
    }
  };

  const getData = async () => {
    try {
      const response_gu = await axios.get("/api/vachnamrut/gu");
      const response_en = await axios.get("/api/vachnamrut/en");
      const response_hi = await axios.get("/api/vachnamrut/hi");
      const response_sa = await axios.get("/api/vachnamrut/sa");
      const response_setumala = await axios.get("/api/vachnamrut/setumala");
      const response_harimulam = await axios.get("/api/vachnamrut/harimulam");
      setVachnamrutGu(response_gu.data);
      setVachnamrutEn(response_en.data);
      setVachnamrutHi(response_hi.data);
      setVachnamrutSa(response_sa.data);
      setVachnamrutSetumala(response_setumala.data);
      setVachnamrutHarimulam(response_harimulam.data);
      // setFilterVachnamrut(response.data);
      return;
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error geting data:", error);
    }
  };

  const getVachnamrutList = async () => {
    try {
      const response = await axios.get("/api/vachnamrut");
      setVachnamrutList(response.data);
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error get Vachnamrut List:", error);
    }
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    // getData();
    getVachnamrutList();
  }, []);

  const filterData = (val) => {
    const filteredResults = [];
    if (val) {
      shikshapatri &&
        shikshapatri.map((item) => {
          if (
            checkWordsInString(
              item.s?.toLowerCase(),
              getDevanagariSearchStrings(val)
            )
          ) {
            filteredResults.push(item);
          }
        });
      setFilterShikshapatri(filteredResults);
    } else {
      setFilterShikshapatri(shikshapatri);
    }
  };

  return (
    <VachnamrutContext.Provider
      value={{
        vachnamrut_en,
        vachnamrut_gu,
        vachnamrut_hi,
        vachnamrut_sa,
        vachnamrut_setumala,
        vachnamrut_harimulam,
        filterVachnamrut,
        currentVachnamrut_gu,
        setCurrentVachnamrut_gu,
        currentVachnamrut_en,
        setCurrentVachnamrut_en,
        currentVachnamrut_hi,
        setCurrentVachnamrut_hi,
        currentVachnamrut_sa,
        setCurrentVachnamrut_sa,
        currentVachnamrut_setumala,
        setCurrentVachnamrut_setumala,
        currentVachnamrut_harimulam,
        setCurrentVachnamrut_harimulam,
        vachnamrutList,
        setVachnamrutList,
        currentVachnamrut,
        setCurrentVachnamrut,
        filterData,
        handleTab,
        tabs,
        vachnamrutLang
      }}
    >
      {children}
    </VachnamrutContext.Provider>
  );
};

export const UpanishadsContextProvider = ({ children  })=>{
    const [upanishads, setUpanishads] = useState();
    const [currentUpanishads, setCurrentUpanishads] = useState();
    const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
    const [currentFileIndex, setCurrentFileIndex] = useState(0);
    const router = useRouter();
    const getData = async ()=>{
        try {
            setLoading(true);
            const response = await axios.get("/api/upanishads");
            setUpanishads(response.data);
            setLoading(false);
            return;
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("Error geting data:", error);
        }
    };
    useEffect(()=>{
        getData();
    }, []);
    const getCurrentData = async ()=>{
        try {
            setLoading(true);
            setCurrentUpanishads(null);
            const response = await axios.get(`/api/upanishads?id=${router?.query?.upanishads_id?.join("-")}`);
            setCurrentUpanishads(response.data);
            setLoading(false);
            return;
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("Error geting data:", error);
        }
    };
    // useEffect(() => {
    //   if (router?.query?.upanishads_id) {
    //     setCurrentUpanishads(null);
    //   }
    // }, [router?.query?.upanishads_id]);
    useEffect(()=>{
        if (router?.query?.upanishads_id) {
            getCurrentData();
        }
    }, [
        router?.query?.upanishads_id
    ]);
    return /*#__PURE__*/ _jsxDEV(UpanishadsContext.Provider, {
        value: {
            upanishads,
            currentUpanishads,
            currentFileIndex,
            setCurrentFileIndex,
            loading

import { useRouter } from "next/router";
import { createContext, useEffect, useState } from "react";

export const UpanishadsContext = createContext();
export const UpanishadsContextProvider = ({ children }) => {
  const [upanishads, setUpanishads] = useState();
  const [currentUpanishads, setCurrentUpanishads] = useState();
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
  const [currentFileIndex, setCurrentFileIndex] = useState(0);

  const router = useRouter();

  const getData = async () => {
    try {
      setLoading(true);
      const response = await axios.get("/api/upanishads");
      setUpanishads(response.data);
      setLoading(false);
      return;
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error geting data:", error);
    }
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    getData();
  }, []);

  const getCurrentData = async () => {
    try {
      setLoading(true);
      setCurrentUpanishads(null);
      const response = await axios.get(
        `/api/upanishads?id=${router?.query?.upanishads_id?.join("-")}`
      );
      setCurrentUpanishads(response.data);
      setLoading(false);

      return;
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error geting data:", error);
    }
  };
  // useEffect(() => {
  //   if (router?.query?.upanishads_id) {
  //     setCurrentUpanishads(null);
  //   }
  // }, [router?.query?.upanishads_id]);

  useEffect(() => {
    if (router?.query?.upanishads_id) {
      getCurrentData();
    }
  }, [router?.query?.upanishads_id]);

  return (
    <UpanishadsContext.Provider
      value={{
        upanishads,
        currentUpanishads,
        currentFileIndex,
        setCurrentFileIndex,
        loading,
      }}
    >
      {children}
    </UpanishadsContext.Provider>
  );
};

/* harmony import */ var axios__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__ = __webpack_require__(/*! axios */ "axios");
/* harmony import */ var next_router__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__ = __webpack_require__(/*! next/router */ "next/router");

/* harmony import */ var react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__ = __webpack_require__(/*! react */ "react");
/* harmony import */ var react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3___default = /*#__PURE__*/__webpack_require__.n(react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__);
/* harmony import */ var sanscript__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_4__ = __webpack_require__(/*! sanscript */ "sanscript");

axios__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__ = (__webpack_async_dependencies__.then ? (await __webpack_async_dependencies__)() : __webpack_async_dependencies__)[0];
webpack/lib/util/registerExternalSerializerwebpack-sources/ReplaceSourcewebpack/lib/util/registerExternalSerializerwebpack-sources/SourceMapSource␀␀import { jsxDEV as _jsxDEV } from "react/jsx-dev-runtime";
import axios from "axios";
import { useRouter } from "next/router";
import { createContext, useEffect, useState } from "react";
import Sanscript from "sanscript";
export const SatsangiJeevanContext = /*#__PURE__*/ createContext();
export const SatsangiJeevanContextProvider = ({ children  })=>{
    const router = useRouter();
    // ================  vachnamrut STATE  ================ //
    const [satsangi_jeevans, setSatsangi_jeevans] = useState();
    const [filterVachnamrut, setFilterVachnamrut] = useState();
    const [satsangiJeevan, setCurrentSangiJeevans] = useState();
    const diacriticsMap = {
        ā: "aa",
        ī: "ee",
        ū: "oo",
        ṛ: "ru",
        l̥: "lu",
        ṅ: "n",
        ñ: "n",
        ṭ: "t",
        ṭh: "th",
        ḍ: "d",
        ḍh: "dh",
        ṇ: "n",
        ś: "sh",
        ṣ: "sh",
        ḥ: "h",
        kṣ: "ksh",
        jñ: "dnya",
        ṁ: "m",
        "j~j": "dnya",
        "~j": "n",
        "~g": "n",
        "~lu": "lu",
        uu: "oo",
        ii: "ee"
    };
    const devanagariCache = new Map();
    const getDevanagariSearchStrings = (t)=>{
        if (!t || !t.trim()) {
            return [];
        }
        if (devanagariCache.has(t)) {
            return devanagariCache.get(t);
        }
        const schemes = [
            "itrans",
            "slp1",
            "hk",
            "iast"
        ];
        const uniqueInputs = new Set([
            t,
            t.toLowerCase()
        ]);
        const devanagariStrings = [];
        for (const scheme of schemes){
            for (const input of uniqueInputs){
                if (input) {
                    devanagariStrings.push(Sanscript.t(input, scheme, "devanagari"));
                    if (![
                        "a",
                        "e",
                        "i",
                        "o",
                        "u"
                    ].includes(input.slice(-1))) {
                        devanagariStrings.push(Sanscript.t(input + "a", scheme, "devanagari"));
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        const result = [
            ...new Set(devanagariStrings)
        ].filter((string)=>string.split("").every((char)=>![
                    "a".charCodeAt(),
                    "z".charCodeAt()
                ].between(char.charCodeAt()) && !Object.keys(diacriticsMap).includes(char) && ![
                    "A".charCodeAt(),
                    "Z".charCodeAt()
                ].between(char.charCodeAt())));
        devanagariCache.set(t, result);
        return result;
    };
    function checkWordsInString(mainString, wordArray) {
        for (let word of wordArray){
            if (mainString?.includes(word)) {
                return true;
            }
        }
        return false;
    }
    const [tabs, setTabs] = useState([
        {
            name: "ગુજરાતી",
            val: "gu"
        },
        {
            name: "English",
            val: "en"
        }
    ]);
    const handleTab = (type)=>{
        if (type === "en") {
            router.push({
                pathname: router.asPath.replace("gu", type)
            });
        } else if (type === "gu") {
            router.push({
                pathname: router.asPath.replace("en", type)
            });
        }
    };
    const getData = async ()=>{
        try {
            // const response = await axios.get("/api/satsangi_jeevan/sa");
            const response = await axios.get("/api/satsangijeevan/prakran");
            setSatsangi_jeevans(response.data.data);
            return;
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("Error geting data:", error);
        }
    };
    useEffect(()=>{
        getData();
    }, []);
    const filterData = (val)=>{
        const filteredResults = [];
        if (val) {
            shikshapatri && shikshapatri.map((item)=>{
                if (checkWordsInString(item.s?.toLowerCase(), getDevanagariSearchStrings(val))) {
                    filteredResults.push(item);
                }
            });
            setFilterShikshapatri(filteredResults);
        } else {
            setFilterShikshapatri(shikshapatri);
        }
    };
    return /*#__PURE__*/ _jsxDEV(SatsangiJeevanContext.Provider, {
        value: {
            satsangi_jeevans,
            filterVachnamrut,
            filterData,
            handleTab,
            tabs,
            satsangiJeevan,
            setCurrentSangiJeevans
        },
        children: children
    }, void 0, false, {
        fileName: "H:\\DHRUVIK\\sardhar-ashtadhyayi\\src\\utils\\satsangi_jeevan\\SatsangiJeevanContext.js",
        lineNumber: 138,
        columnNumber: 5
    }, this);
};

const SatsangiJeevanContext = /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.createContext)();
const SatsangiJeevanContextProvider = ({ children  })=>{
    const router = (0,next_router__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__.useRouter)();
    // ================  vachnamrut STATE  ================ //
    const [satsangi_jeevans, setSatsangi_jeevans] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.useState)();
    const [filterVachnamrut, setFilterVachnamrut] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.useState)();
    const [satsangiJeevan, setCurrentSangiJeevans] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.useState)();
    const diacriticsMap = {
        ā: "aa",
        ī: "ee",
        ū: "oo",
        ṛ: "ru",
        l̥: "lu",
        ṅ: "n",
        ñ: "n",
        ṭ: "t",
        ṭh: "th",
        ḍ: "d",
        ḍh: "dh",
        ṇ: "n",
        ś: "sh",
        ṣ: "sh",
        ḥ: "h",
        kṣ: "ksh",
        jñ: "dnya",
        ṁ: "m",
        "j~j": "dnya",
        "~j": "n",
        "~g": "n",
        "~lu": "lu",
        uu: "oo",
        ii: "ee"
    };
    const devanagariCache = new Map();
    const getDevanagariSearchStrings = (t)=>{
        if (!t || !t.trim()) {
            return [];
        }
        if (devanagariCache.has(t)) {
            return devanagariCache.get(t);
        }
        const schemes = [
            "itrans",
            "slp1",
            "hk",
            "iast"
        ];
        const uniqueInputs = new Set([
            t,
            t.toLowerCase()
        ]);
        const devanagariStrings = [];
        for (const scheme of schemes){
            for (const input of uniqueInputs){
                if (input) {
                    devanagariStrings.push(sanscript__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_4___default().t(input, scheme, "devanagari"));
                    if (![
                        "a",
                        "e",
                        "i",
                        "o",
                        "u"
                    ].includes(input.slice(-1))) {
                        devanagariStrings.push(sanscript__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_4___default().t(input + "a", scheme, "devanagari"));
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        const result = [
            ...new Set(devanagariStrings)
        ].filter((string)=>string.split("").every((char)=>![
                    "a".charCodeAt(),
                    "z".charCodeAt()
                ].between(char.charCodeAt()) && !Object.keys(diacriticsMap).includes(char) && ![
                    "A".charCodeAt(),
                    "Z".charCodeAt()
                ].between(char.charCodeAt())));
        devanagariCache.set(t, result);
        return result;
    };
    function checkWordsInString(mainString, wordArray) {
        for (let word of wordArray){
            if (mainString?.includes(word)) {
                return true;
            }
        }
        return false;
    }
    const [tabs, setTabs] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.useState)([
        {
            name: "ગુજરાતી",
            val: "gu"
        },
        {
            name: "English",
            val: "en"
        }
    ]);
    const handleTab = (type)=>{
        if (type === "en") {
            router.push({
                pathname: router.asPath.replace("gu", type)
            });
        } else if (type === "gu") {
            router.push({
                pathname: router.asPath.replace("en", type)
            });
        }
    };
    const getData = async ()=>{
        try {
            // const response = await axios.get("/api/satsangi_jeevan/sa");
            const response = await axios__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__["default"].get("/api/satsangijeevan/prakran");
            setSatsangi_jeevans(response.data.data);
            return;
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("Error geting data:", error);
        }
    };
    (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__.useEffect)(()=>{
        getData();
    }, []);
    const filterData = (val)=>{
        const filteredResults = [];
        if (val) {
            shikshapatri && shikshapatri.map((item)=>{
                if (checkWordsInString(item.s?.toLowerCase(), getDevanagariSearchStrings(val))) {
                    filteredResults.push(item);
                }
            });
            setFilterShikshapatri(filteredResults);
        } else {
            setFilterShikshapatri(shikshapatri);
        }
    };
    return /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(SatsangiJeevanContext.Provider, {
        value: {
            satsangi_jeevans,
            filterVachnamrut,
            filterData,
            handleTab,
            tabs,
            satsangiJeevan,
            setCurrentSangiJeevans
        },
        children: children
    }, void 0, false, {

axios from "axios";
import { useRouter } from "next/router";
import { createContext, useEffect, useState } from "react";
import Sanscript from "sanscript";

export const SatsangiJeevanContext = createContext();
export const SatsangiJeevanContextProvider = ({ children }) => {
  const router = useRouter();
  // ================  vachnamrut STATE  ================ //
  const [satsangi_jeevans, setSatsangi_jeevans] = useState();
  const [filterVachnamrut, setFilterVachnamrut] = useState();
  const [satsangiJeevan, setCurrentSangiJeevans] = useState();
  const diacriticsMap = {
    ā: "aa",
    ī: "ee",
    ū: "oo",
    ṛ: "ru",
    l̥: "lu",
    ṅ: "n",
    ñ: "n",
    ṭ: "t",
    ṭh: "th",
    ḍ: "d",
    ḍh: "dh",
    ṇ: "n",
    ś: "sh",
    ṣ: "sh",
    ḥ: "h",
    kṣ: "ksh",
    jñ: "dnya",
    ṁ: "m",
    "j~j": "dnya",
    "~j": "n",
    "~g": "n",
    "~lu": "lu",
    uu: "oo",
    ii: "ee",
  };
  const devanagariCache = new Map();
  const getDevanagariSearchStrings = (t) => {
    if (!t || !t.trim()) {
      return [];
    }
    if (devanagariCache.has(t)) {
      return devanagariCache.get(t);
    }
    const schemes = ["itrans", "slp1", "hk", "iast"];
    const uniqueInputs = new Set([t, t.toLowerCase()]);
    const devanagariStrings = [];
    for (const scheme of schemes) {
      for (const input of uniqueInputs) {
        if (input) {
          devanagariStrings.push(Sanscript.t(input, scheme, "devanagari"));
          if (!["a", "e", "i", "o", "u"].includes(input.slice(-1))) {
            devanagariStrings.push(
              Sanscript.t(input + "a", scheme, "devanagari")
            );
          }
        }
      }
    }
    const result = [...new Set(devanagariStrings)].filter((string) =>
      string
        .split("")
        .every(
          (char) =>
            !["a".charCodeAt(), "z".charCodeAt()].between(char.charCodeAt()) &&
            !Object.keys(diacriticsMap).includes(char) &&
            !["A".charCodeAt(), "Z".charCodeAt()].between(char.charCodeAt())
        )
    );
    devanagariCache.set(t, result);
    return result;
  };

  function checkWordsInString(mainString, wordArray) {
    for (let word of wordArray) {
      if (mainString?.includes(word)) {
        return true;
      }
    }
    return false;
  }

  const [tabs, setTabs] = useState([
    { name: "ગુજરાતી", val: "gu" },
    { name: "English", val: "en" },
  ]);

  const handleTab = (type) => {
    if (type === "en") {
      router.push({
        pathname: router.asPath.replace("gu", type),
      });
    } else if (type === "gu") {
      router.push({
        pathname: router.asPath.replace("en", type),
      });
    }
  };

  const getData = async () => {
    try {
      // const response = await axios.get("/api/satsangi_jeevan/sa");
      const response = await axios.get("/api/satsangijeevan/prakran");
      setSatsangi_jeevans(response.data.data);
      return;
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error geting data:", error);
    }
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    getData();
  }, []);

  const filterData = (val) => {
    const filteredResults = [];
    if (val) {
      shikshapatri &&
        shikshapatri.map((item) => {
          if (
            checkWordsInString(
              item.s?.toLowerCase(),
              getDevanagariSearchStrings(val)
            )
          ) {
            filteredResults.push(item);
          }
        });
      setFilterShikshapatri(filteredResults);
    } else {
      setFilterShikshapatri(shikshapatri);
    }
  };

  return (
    <SatsangiJeevanContext.Provider
      value={{
        satsangi_jeevans,
        filterVachnamrut,
        filterData,
        handleTab,
        tabs,
        satsangiJeevan,
        setCurrentSangiJeevans,
      }}
    >
      {children}
    </SatsangiJeevanContext.Provider>
  );
};

    const sutratypeArray = [
        {
            id: 1,
            route: "sanjna",
            key: "S",
            type: "संज्ञासूत्राणि "
        },
        {
            id: 2,
            route: "paribhasha",
            key: "P",
            type: "परिभाषासूत्राणि "
        },
        {
            id: 3,
